name: Summit (BootsInBoots)
description:
Summit is a game made for "My First Game Jam"

Play as a climber facing the challenges of climbing a mountain. If you stay still too long you might freeze to death; if you push yourself too hard you might lose your breath.

Play using WASD or arrow keys, select menu options with the space bar.

Artwork made by Rhaphiel Molinar during the two weeks allotted for this jam,

Game design, level design, and programming done by Alexander Rhys during the same two weeks,

Music by Kai Engel, who is not affiliated with this game in any way but deserves credit: https://www.kai-engel.com/
